channel.description: Recent content in windows-11 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Add Any Application to Windows Startup
item.description: Open any application on Windows 11 Startup Use the Windows key+R keyboard combination to open the Run dialog box. Enter shell:startup to open the Windows 11 startup folder Right-click in the folder > select New > Shortcut > Browse > New > Finish to add a new startup program
item.content:
Open any application on Windows 11 Startup

Use the Windows key+R keyboard combination to open the Run dialog box. Enter shell:startup to open the Windows 11 startup folder

Right-click in the folder > select New > Shortcut > Browse > New > Finish to add a new startup program
